description:
the process of attaching a interface to a vm is synchronous, so should be detaching interface, otherwise, the exceptions will never be captured or reported. See code below:

    def attach_interface(self, ctxt, instance, network_id, port_id,
                         requested_ip):
        instance_p = jsonutils.to_primitive(instance)
        return self.call(ctxt, self.make_msg('attach_interface',
                 instance=instance_p, network_id=network_id,
                 port_id=port_id, requested_ip=requested_ip),
                 topic=_compute_topic(self.topic, ctxt, None, instance),
                 version='2.25')

    def detach_interface(self, ctxt, instance, port_id):
        instance_p = jsonutils.to_primitive(instance)
        self.cast(ctxt, self.make_msg('detach_interface',
                 instance=instance_p, port_id=port_id),
                 topic=_compute_topic(self.topic, ctxt, None, instance),
                 version='2.25')
title: Detaching interface should be synchronous

comments.content:
the process of attaching a interface to a vm is synchronous, so should be detaching interface, or the exceptions will never be captured or reported. See code below:

    def attach_interface(self, ctxt, instance, network_id, port_id,
                         requested_ip):
        instance_p = jsonutils.to_primitive(instance)
        return self.call(ctxt, self.make_msg('attach_interface',
                 instance=instance_p, network_id=network_id,
                 port_id=port_id, requested_ip=requested_ip),
                 topic=_compute_topic(self.topic, ctxt, None, instance),
                 version='2.25')

    def detach_interface(self, ctxt, instance, port_id):
        instance_p = jsonutils.to_primitive(instance)
        self.cast(ctxt, self.make_msg('detach_interface',
                 instance=instance_p, port_id=port_id),
                 topic=_compute_topic(self.topic, ctxt, None, instance),
                 version='2.25')
